title: Help! Store shows black screen when I click on it.
body:
Title pretty much says it all.
Previously I had the same problem but it showed some error thingy I can't remember what it was. It was like the 404 errors.

replies.body: Black screen errors are usually caused by connection issues failing to download assets and load your page.  Going over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for the fix!  Let me know if you have any questions.
